content: across the 32 instep stitches on needle 1 k1 ssk knit 15 pm this marker will mark the end of the round row 2 knit all stitches repeat these two row until 32 stitches remain on needle 1 foot continue knitting all stitches on every round until sock measures within 2 inches of the total length that you want your sock to be toe row 1 knit to within 3 stitches of the end of needle 1 k2tog k1 on needle two k1 ssk to within 3 stitches of the end of needle 2 k2tog k1 needle 1 k1 ssk knit to the end of row 1 row 2 knit all stitches repeat these two row until 24 stitches remain 12 stitches on each needle cut yarn and graft stitches together
